# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that enables and disables the map button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Controlling the Button

- **isHidden**: A Boolean value that hides and shows the map button.
